00001| import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';

00003| const DADATA_API_KEY = 'eb87bbb3789bb43ed465f796892ea951f9e91008';
00004| const DADATA_SECRET_KEY = '90f3541a30ef6e1c40e665b69f1aa6d74242c3f2';
00005| 
00006| // –ù–æ—Ä–º–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è –∞–¥—Ä–µ—Å–∞ —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ DaData
00007| export async function POST(request: NextRequest) {
00008|   try {
00009|     const { address, type = 'clean' } = await request.json();
00010| 
00011|     if (!address) {
00012|       return NextResponse.json(

00019| 
00020|     let url = '';

00023|       'Content-Type': 'application/json',
00024|       'Accept': 'application/json',
00025|       'Authorization': `Token ${DADATA_API_KEY}`,
00026|     };
00027| 
00028|     if (type === 'clean') {
00029|       // –û—á–∏—Å—Ç–∫–∞ –∏ –Ω–æ—Ä–º–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è –∞–¥—Ä–µ—Å–∞
00030|       url = 'https://cleaner.dadata.ru/api/v1/clean/address';
00031|       body = JSON.stringify([address]);
00032|       headers['X-Secret'] = DADATA_SECRET_KEY;
00033|     } else if (type === 'suggest') {
00034|       // –ü–æ–¥—Å–∫–∞–∑–∫–∏ –∞–¥—Ä–µ—Å–æ–≤
00035|       url = 'https://suggestions.dadata.ru/suggestions/api/4_1/rs/suggest/address';
00036|       body = JSON.stringify({
00037|         query: address,
00038|         count: 10
00039|       });
00040|     }
00041| 
00042|     console.log('üåê DaData URL:', url);
00043|     console.log('üåê DaData Body:', body);
00044| 
00045|     const response = await fetch(url, {
00046|       method: 'POST',
00047|       headers,
00048|       body
00049|     });
00050| 
00051|     const data = await response.json();
00052|     
00053|     console.log('üåê DaData response status:', response.status);
00054|     console.log('üåê DaData response:', JSON.stringify(data, null, 2));
00055| 
00056|     if (!response.ok) {
00057|       console.error('‚ùå DaData API error:', data);
00058|       return NextResponse.json(
00059|         { error: 'DaData API error', details: data },
00060|         { status: response.status }
00061|       );
00062|     }
00063| 
00064|     // –û–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç–∞ –≤ –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –æ—Ç —Ç–∏–ø–∞ –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å–∞
00065|     if (type === 'clean' && Array.isArray(data) && data.length > 0) {
00066|       const cleanedAddress = data[0];
00067|       
00068|       // –§–æ—Ä–º–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –Ω–æ—Ä–º–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –∞–¥—Ä–µ—Å –¥–ª—è –î–µ–ª–æ–≤—ã—Ö –õ–∏–Ω–∏–π
00069|       const dellinFormat = formatAddressForDellin(cleanedAddress);
00070|

00081|       });
00082|     } else if (type === 'suggest' && data.suggestions && Array.isArray(data.suggestions)) {
00083|       const suggestions = data.suggestions.map((suggestion: any) => ({

00115| function formatAddressForDellin(addressData: any): string {
00116|   const parts: string[] = [];
00117|   
00118|   // –î–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è–µ–º —Ä–µ–≥–∏–æ–Ω —Å —Ç–∏–ø–æ–º
00119|   if (addressData.region_with_type) {
00120|     parts.push(addressData.region_with_type);
00121|   }
00122|   
00123|   // –î–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è–µ–º –≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥ —Å —Ç–∏–ø–æ–º
00124|   if (addressData.city_with_type) {
00125|     parts.push(addressData.city_with_type);
00126|   } else if (addressData.settlement_with_type) {
00127|     parts.push(addressData.settlement_with_type);
00128|   }
00129|   
00130|   // –î–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è–µ–º —É–ª–∏—Ü—É —Å —Ç–∏–ø–æ–º
00131|   if (addressData.street_with_type) {
00132|     parts.push(addressData.street_with_type);
00133|   }
00134|   
00135|   // –î–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è–µ–º –¥–æ–º
00136|   if (addressData.house) {
00137|     let houseStr = `–¥. ${addressData.house}`;
00138|     
00139|     // –î–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è–µ–º –∫–æ—Ä–ø—É—Å –µ—Å–ª–∏ –µ—Å—Ç—å
00140|     if (addressData.block) {
00141|       houseStr += `, –∫–æ—Ä–ø. ${addressData.block}`;
00142|     }
00143|     
00144|     parts.push(houseStr);
00145|   }
00146|   
00147|   const formatted = parts.join(', ');
00148|   console.log('üè† Formatted address for Dellin:', formatted);
00149|   
00150|   return formatted || addressData.result || '';
00151| }
00152| 
00153| // –ü–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –æ –≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥–µ –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–∏—Å–∫–∞ —Ç–µ—Ä–º–∏–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≤
00154| export async function GET(request: NextRequest) {
00155|   try {
00156|     const { searchParams } = new URL(request.url);
00157|     const cityName = searchParams.get('city');
00158| 
00159|     if (!cityName) {
00160|       return NextResponse.json(
00161|         { error: 'City name is required' },
00162|         { status: 400 }
00163|       );
00164|     }
00165| 
00166|     console.log('üèôÔ∏è DaData city search:', cityName);
00167| 
00168|     const response = await fetch('https://suggestions.dadata.ru/suggestions/api/4_1/rs/suggest/address', {
00169|       method: 'POST',
00170|       headers: {
00171|         'Content-Type': 'application/json',
00172|         'Accept': 'application/json',
00173|         'Authorization': `Token ${DADATA_API_KEY}`,
00174|       },
00175|       body: JSON.stringify({
00176|         query: cityName,
00177|         count: 5,
00178|         locations: [{ country: '*' }],
00179|         restrict_value: true
00180|       })
00181|     });
00182| 
00183|     const data = await response.json();
00184|     
00185|     console.log('üèôÔ∏è DaData city response:', JSON.stringify(data, null, 2));
00186| 
00187|     if (!response.ok) {
00188|       return NextResponse.json(
00189|         { error: 'DaData API error', details: data },
00190|         { status: response.status }
00191|       );
00192|     }
00193| 
00194|     if (data.suggestions && Array.isArray(data.suggestions)) {
00195|       const cities = data.suggestions
00196|         .filter((s: any) => s.data.city || s.data.settlement)
00197|         .map((suggestion: any) => ({
00198|           value: suggestion.value,
00199|           city: suggestion.data.city || suggestion.data.settlement,
00200|           region: suggestion.data.region,
00201|           city_kladr_id: suggestion.data.city_kladr_id || suggestion.data.settlement_kladr_id,
00202|           region_kladr_id: suggestion.data.region_kladr_id,
00203|           dellinFormat: formatAddressForDellin(suggestion.data)
00204|         }));
00205| 
00206|       return NextResponse.json({
00207|         success: true,
00208|         data: cities
00209|       });
00210|     }
00211| 
00212|     return NextResponse.json({
00213|       success: false,
00214|       error: 'No cities found'
00215|     });
00216| 
00217|   } catch (error) {
00218|     console.error('‚ùå DaData city search error:', error);
00219|     return NextResponse.json(
00220|       { 
00221|         error: 'Internal server error',
00222|         details: error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Unknown error'
00223|       },
00224|       { status: 500 }
00225|     );
00226|   }
00227| }
